QuestData.Title: Explorers' League Document (3 of 6)
QuestData.Description: The document bears the Explorers' League crest and contains historical records for all the notable locations in Loch Modan. Sooty smudges lead you to believe it was likely stolen by the Dark Iron spies in the area.$B$BYou recall mention of missing documents at the Explorers' League building in Thelsamar.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return the Explorers' League Document to Torren Squarejaw in Thelsamar.
QuestData.RewardText: Our historical records! The thought of Dark Iron vermin delving into our past just made me sick to my stomach.$B$BWe appreciate you bringing this back to us. We'd like to offer you some coin as a reward.
